name: Marcus De Leeuw
description: Main thing which I recognize is the relation between process and content whereby the process is at least as important as the content. To keep students engaged you most come up with new formats and enable identification and discussion. It is very time-consuming because you always need to come up with new clips, discussion questions and learning formats.
